introSection.heading1: Full Stack Developer with expertise in building scalable, multi-tenant SaaS platforms using React (TypeScript), Python (Django), Java (Spring Boot), C++, Go and PostgreSQL.
introSection.heading2: Cloud-Native Specialist experienced in architecting AWS environments (ECS, Lambda, RDS) and managing container orchestration via Docker and Kubernetes.
introSection.heading3: Collaborative leader skilled in API-first design, Agile methodologies, and writing clean, maintainable code following SOLID principles.

skill.title: Skills & Toolkit
skill.subtitle: Technologies and tools I use to build and ship products
